Description_ENTITYBEHAVIOR_MAXEXPTONEXTM: The magic experience multiplier. This is calculated as Math.Pow(<max exp mana>, <config option> - (<max exp mana> * 0.0005)). [Default: 1.35, Min:0.01, Max: 10 (Why would you do this???)]
Description_ENTITYBEHAVIOR_MAXMANA_MINIM: The minimum required player max mana needed to ascend to magic tier 2. [Default: 50, Min:10, Max: ???]
The minimum required player max mana needed to ascend to magic tier 3. [Default: 200, Min:10, Max: ???]
Description_ENTITYBEHAVIOR_MAXMANA_TOTAL: The maximum achievable player max mana for magic tier 1. [Default: 51, Min:10, Max: ???]
The maximum achievable player max mana for magic tier 2. [Default: 201, Min:10, Max: ???]
The maximum achievable player max mana for magic tier 3. [Default: 9999, Min:10, Max: ???]
Description_CAN_SPELL_FAILURE_EXPLOSION_: Can spell failure explosions affect blocks? [Default: true] (True = Blocks can be placed/destroyed on non-claimed land.) | (False = No blocks can be placed/destroyed.)
Can spell failure explosions affect entities? [Default: true] (True = Entities can be damaged on non-claimed land.) | (False = No entity damage.)
Description_ENTITYBEHAVIOR_MEDITATION_TI: Amount of time needed to activate 'Meditation' after sitting, in seconds. [Default: 7, Min:1, Max: 60]
Description_MEDITATIONINSIGHT_RESEARCHTI: Amount of time needed to research a block with 'Mediation Insight', in seconds. [Default: 5, Min:1, Max: 60]
Description_UNLOCKMAGIC_MINIMUMSTABILITY: Amount of temporal stability required to use rusty dust to unlock magic. [Default: 0.10, Min:0.01, Max: 0.99]
Description_HUD_MANABAR_POSITION: Sets the position of the mana/magic exp bars in the HUD. [Default: 0 = On top of health bar, 1 = On top of satiety bar, 2 = On top of satiety bar higher up]
Description_HUD_EFFECTSLIST_POSITION: Sets the default position of the 'effects list' in the HUD. [Default: 0 = Middle left of the game window, 1 = Top left of the game window, 2 = Top center of the game window]
Description_ITEM_LEYLINERESONATOR_CONNEC: Maximum connection distance between magic stations, in blocks. [Default: 50, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_ITEM_ESSENCELACRIMA_MAXESSEN: Maximum amount of essence an 'essence lacrima' can hold? [Default: 50000, Min:100, Max: 9999999?]
Description_ITEM_RIFTBLOOMSEED_DROPRATE: The percent chance a riftbloom seed will drop when breaking unstable riftblooms. [Default: 20, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_ITEM_RIFTBLOOMSEED_RIFTANCHO: The percent chance a riftbloom seed will drop when breaking unstable riftblooms created from a rift anchor. [Default: 40, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_ITEM_RIFTBLOOMSEED_DROPRATE_: The percent chance a riftbloom seed will drop when harvesting a riftbloom with a knife. [Default: 75, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_ITEM_RIFTBLOOMSEED_TRANSMUTA: The percent chance a riftbloom seed will drop when harvesting a riftbloom with the spell 'Transmutation'. [Default: 95, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_ITEM_SMALLRUSTCRYSTAL_DROPRA: The percent chance a small rust crystal will drop when breaking unstable rust crystals. [Default: 10, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_ITEM_MEDIUMRUSTCRYSTAL_DROPR: The percent chance a medium rust crystal will drop when breaking unstable rust crystals. [Default: 10, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_ITEM_LARGERUSTCRYSTAL_DROPRA: The percent chance a large rust crystal will drop when breaking unstable rust crystals. [Default: 10, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_ITEM_SMALLRUSTCRYSTAL_RIFTAN: The percent chance a small rust crystal will drop when breaking unstable small rust crystals created from a rift anchor. [Default: 50, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_ITEM_MEDIUMRUSTCRYSTAL_RIFTA: The percent chance a small rust crystal will drop when breaking unstable medium rust crystals created from a rift anchor. [Default: 40, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_ITEM_LARGERUSTCRYSTAL_RIFTAN: The percent chance a large rust crystal will drop when breaking unstable large rust crystals created from a rift anchor. [Default: 33, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_BLOCK_DARKNEXUS_IGNOREENTITY: Any entities with health above this value are ignored by the 'dark nexus' block. [Default: 50, Min:1, Max: 9999]
Any 'entity registery names' in this list are ignored by the 'dark nexus' block.
Description_BLOCK_UTILITY_BURNTIMEAMOUNT: Amount of burn time gained from using rusty dust on any utility block, in minutes. [Default: 15, Min:1, Max: 60]
Amount of burn time gained from using the spell 'Transmutation' on any utility block, in minutes. [Default: 10, Min:1, Max: 60]
Description_ITEM_GRIMOIRE_DURABILITYLOSS: Should 'sanctum' socketed grimoires lose durability on player death? [Default: true]
Minimum amount of durability 'sanctum' socketed grimoires lose on player death? [Default: 5, Min:0, Max: 100]
Maximum amount of durability 'sanctum' socketed grimoires lose on player death? [Default: 20, Min:0, Max: 100]
Description_ITEMSPELLSCROLL_RESTRICTEDTO: Should 'spell scrolls' only be used by players who unlock magic? [Default: false]
Description_ITEMSPELLSCROLL_BASE_CASTTIM: Base 'cast time' for using a spell scroll? [Default: 0f, Min: 0f, Max: 60f (0f = original spell cast time | 1f+ = static cast time in seconds.)]
Base modifier applied to the 'cast time' of a tier 1 spell scroll? [Default: 1.0f, Min: 0.01f, Max: 10f (0.5f = 50% cast time | 1.0f = original cast time | 2.0f = 200% cast time)]
Base modifier applied to the 'cast time' of a tier 2 spell scroll? [Default: 1.0f, Min: 0.01f, Max: 10f (0.5f = 50% cast time | 1.0f = original cast time | 2.0f = 200% cast time)]
Base modifier applied to the 'cast time' of a tier 3 spell scroll? [Default: 1.0f, Min: 0.01f, Max: 10f (0.5f = 50% cast time | 1.0f = original cast time | 2.0f = 200% cast time)]
Description_ITEMSPELLSCROLL_COST_GRIMOIR: The amount of grimoire durability that is consumed when duplicating a tier 1 spell? [Default: 15, Min: 0, Max: 100]
The amount of grimoire durability that is consumed when duplicating a tier 2 spell? [Default: 30, Min: 0, Max: 100]
The amount of grimoire durability that is consumed when duplicating a tier 3 spell? [Default: 45, Min: 0, Max: 100]
Description_ITEMSPELLSCROLL_COST_CREATIO: Base 'cast time' needed when creating a spell scroll? [Default: 15f, Min: 1f, Max: 60f]
Description_ITEMSPELLSCROLL_BASE_MAXDURA: Base 'max durability' a tier 1 spell scroll has? [Default: 4, Min: 1, Max: 9999+]
Base 'max durability' a tier 2 spell scroll has? [Default: 2, Min: 1, Max: 9999+]
Base 'max durability' a tier 3 spell scroll has? [Default: 1, Min: 1, Max: 9999+]
Description_LOCK_ALL_MAGIC_TO_RUSTMAGE_O: Should all magic be lock to the 'Rust Mage' class only? [Default: false]
Description_LOCK_ADVANCED_MAGIC_TO_RUSTM: Should magic tier 2 and 3 be lock to the 'Rust Mage' class only? [Default: false]
Description_ENTITYBEHAVIOR_MAXEXPTONEXTM: The amount of bonus magic experience the 'Rust Mage' class has, based on the experience multiplier in percent? [Default: 5, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_BLOCK_TEMPORALMAGICRUNE_CONS: The percent chance an temporal magic rune will be consumed in magic arrays. [Default: 10, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_BLOCK_RUSTICLIGHTNEUTRALDARK: The percent chance a rustic, light, neutral, or dark manatorch will become an inert version in magic arrays. [Default: 100, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_BLOCK_RUSTIC_MANATORCH_CONSU: The percent chance a rustic manatorch will convert back into an inert version in magic arrays. [Default: 50, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_BLOCK_LIGHTNEUTRALDARK_MANAT: The percent chance a light, neutral, or dark manatorch will convert back into an inert version in magic arrays. [Default: 50, Min:1, Max: 100]
Description_BLOCK_MANALANTERN_CONSUMPTIO: The percent chance a mana lantern will convert back into an inert mana lantern in magic arrays. [Default: 5, Min:1, Max: 100]
